Package com.herocraftonline.heroes.api.events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CharacterDamageEvent
    This event is called for any DamageEvent detected in the HeroesDamageListener which is not already handled via SkillDamageEvent and WeaponDamageEvent (fall, non-skill magic, environment, etc)
    ClassChangeEvent
    This is a cancellable event that fires whenever a hero changes from one class to another.
    ExperienceChangeEvent
    This event is fired whenever a hero gains or loses experience.
    HeroChangeLevelEvent
    Called when a Hero changes levels, either through admin commands or when Experience adjusts their level higher/lower..\ Data during this event is unable to be changed.
    HeroEnterCombatEvent  
    HeroJoinPartyEvent
    Called when a Hero is attempting to join a party.
    HeroKillCharacterEvent  
    HeroLeaveCombatEvent  
    HeroLeavePartyEvent
    This event is called when a hero leaves a party.
    HeroRegainHealthEvent
    Called when a hero regains health, primarily from a skill.
    HeroRegainManaEvent
    This event is called when a hero would regain mana, this event is cancellable
    ManaChangeEvent  
    PartyChatEvent
    This event is called when a hero chats to his party members, this event is cancellable
    PartyInviteEvent  
    SkillCompleteEvent
    Called when a hero completes a skill - either successfully or unsuccessfully.
    SkillDamageEvent
    This event is called when a skill would deal damage.
    SkillUseEvent
    Called when a hero uses a skill.
    WeaponDamageEvent
    This event is called when a DamageCause.ATTACK event is registered in the heroesdamagelistener Both creatures & Players can cause this event to be fired even if they aren't using a 'weapon' per se.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HeroLeavePartyEvent.LeavePartyReason
